      • onCreateView

        public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                         ViewGroup container,
                         Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called to have the fragment instantiate its user interface view
        Parameters:
        inflater - The LayoutInflater object that can be used to inflate any views in the fragment
        container - If non-null, this is the parent view that the fragment's UI should be attached to. The fragment should not add the view itself, but this can be used to generate the LayoutParams of the view. This value may be null.
        savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being re-constructed from a previous saved state as given here
        Returns:
        Return the View for the fragment's UI, or null.
